announcement.title_zh: 关于PokerFi生态经济模型PK市值共识机制正式开启的公告
announcement.title_en: Announcement on the official launch of the PK market value consensus mechanism of the PokerFi ecological economic model
list_zh: 随着PokerFi经济模型及社区拓展的良性运转，PokerFi即将进入快速的发展阶段，在全新的阶段，PokerFi的社区价值共识将愈发强大，为快速推动PokerFi发展进程，凝聚PK价值强共识，经共识委员会决定：继试行之后，将于9月1日15：00（GMT+8）正式开启PK币市值共识机制，具体如下：
当用户在Pancake  Swap 卖出PK币时，将同时触发10%单边燃烧合约，即从钱包余额同步扣除卖出数额10%比例的PK币，被扣除的10%比例PK币，分配规则为：
3. 10%奖励给所有购买过PK币的用户，依照PK币买入的数量权重进行分配;
该机制的正式推行，将在一定程度放大PK币的通缩属性，更重要的是深度凝聚PK市值共识，真正打开PK的增值空间，给予深度共识者巨额的红利回馈！
list_en: With the positive operation of the PokerFi economic model and community expansion, PokerFi is about to enter a stage of rapid development. In a brand new stage, the consensus of PokerFi's community value will become stronger and stronger. In order to quickly promote the development of PokerFi, a strong consensus on PK value will be gathered. The committee decided: Following the trial implementation, the PK coin market value consensus mechanism will be officially opened at 15:00 (GMT+8) on September 1, as follows:

When a user sells PK coins on Pancake Swap, a 10% unilateral burning contract will be triggered at the same time, that is, 10% of the PK coins sold and the deducted 10% of the PK coins will be deducted from the wallet balance. The distribution rules are as follows:
2. 30% provides liquidity support for PK/BNB trading pairs;
3. 10% rewards are given to all users who have purchased PK coins, and are distributed according to the weight of the number of PK coins purchased;

The formal implementation of this mechanism will amplify the deflationary properties of PK coins to a certain extent, and more importantly, deepen the consensus on the market value of PK, truly open up the value-added space of PK, and give huge dividends to those who have deep consensus!
